trans-unit.source: Indicates if a bank is deleted or still in use.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if a bank is deleted or still in use.

target.mrk: 指示银行已删除还是仍在使用。

trans-unit.source: Marking a bank as deleted indicates that your company or your customers or your suppliers no longer actively use that bank to transact business. Because of historical data and legal reasons, however, it is not possible to truly delete a bank. A bank marked as deleted will still appear in your list of bank accounts unless you choose to hide it by selecting <emphasis>No</emphasis> in the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> drop-down list and then clicking <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: Marking a bank as deleted indicates that your company or your customers or your suppliers no longer actively use that bank to transact business.
Because of historical data and legal reasons, however, it is not possible to truly delete a bank.

A bank marked as deleted will still appear in your list of bank accounts unless you choose to hide it by selecting <emphasis>No</emphasis> in the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> drop-down list and then clicking <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 将银行标记为已删除表示您的公司、客户或您的供应商不再主动使用该银行进行交易。
但是，由于历史数据和法律原因，无法真正删除银行。
标记为已删除的银行仍会在您的银行账户清单中显示，除非通过在<uicontrol>标记为已删除</uicontrol>下拉列表中选择<emphasis>否</emphasis>并单击<uicontrol>执行</uicontrol>以将其隐藏。

trans-unit.source: You can reactivate a bank by unmarking it.

seg-source.mrk: You can reactivate a bank by unmarking it.

target.mrk: 可通过取消标记银行将其重新激活。

trans-unit.source: All banks initially have the status of <uicontrol>No</uicontrol> for the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> filter.

seg-source.mrk: All banks initially have the status of <uicontrol>No</uicontrol> for the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> filter.

target.mrk: 对于<uicontrol>标记为已删除</uicontrol>过滤器，所有银行最初的状态均为<uicontrol>否</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: To mark a bank for deletion, open a bank, and then choose the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> button in the object page.

seg-source.mrk: To mark a bank for deletion, open a bank, and then choose the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> button in the object page.

target.mrk: 要将银行标记为删除，请打开银行，然后在对象页面中选择<uicontrol>标记为已删除</uicontrol>按钮。

trans-unit.source: For a bank account that has been marked as deleted, you can choose the <uicontrol>Unmark as Deleted</uicontrol> button to reactivate it for use.

seg-source.mrk: For a bank account that has been marked as deleted, you can choose the <uicontrol>Unmark as Deleted</uicontrol> button to reactivate it for use.

target.mrk: 对于已标记为已删除的银行账户，您可以选择<uicontrol>取消标记为已删除</uicontrol>按钮将其重新激活以供使用。
